amendment.description: To provide funds to implement and administer Team Nutrition programs, with an offset.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 2115 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 2115 proposed by Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S14104-14106; text: CR S14104) To provide funds to implement and administer Team Nutrition programs, with an offset.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2115 proposed by Senator Bingaman.
